title: Data Pipeline
description: Build a data processing pipeline that filters, transforms, and aggregates a list of records.
instructions: Given a list of student scores, filter passing scores (>=60), calculate the average, and print the result formatted to one decimal place.

hints.text: Use filter { it >= 60 } to get passing scores
Use String.format or formatting to show one decimal place

commonMistakes.correction: The average() function returns Double automatically

commonMistakes.mistake: Including failing scores in the average

commonMistakes.consequence: NaN from average() on empty list
commonMistakes.correction: Handle the case where no scores pass
